data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
In the minute 2, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to PSG.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, PSG to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
In Lille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Stade Pierre Mauroy, Thilo Kehrer has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 9, PSG have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Lille's Burak Yilmaz is on target but unsuccessful.
PSG have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 15, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Free kick Lille.
Presnel Kimpembe is booked for the away team.
Free kick for PSG in the half of Lille.
In the minute 22, Thilo Kehrer (PSG) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
Rafinha's header is off-target for PSG.
In the minute 25, Lille have a goal kick.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Lille.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for PSG close to the penalty box.
In Lille PSG attack through Angel Di Maria. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Lille.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lille.
Angel Di Maria of PSG is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 34, Francois Letexier signals a Lille throw-in in PSG's half.
Corner awarded to Lille.
Botman Sven (Lille) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 35, Francois Letexier awards PSG a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
Free kick PSG.
In the minute 42, Moise Kean gets his shot on target but fails to score for PSG.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for PSG close to the penalty box.
Can PSG capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lille's half?
Lille will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from PSG.
In the minute 45, In Lille PSG drive forward through Presnel Kimpembe. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for PSG in their own half.
Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Moise Kean (PSG) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Francois Letexier signals a PSG throw-in in Lille's half.
In Lille Lille's Yusuf Yazici is caught offside.
In the minute 55, Francois Letexier signals a throw-in for PSG, close to Lille's area.
Lille have a goal kick.
In Lille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 58, PSG drive upfield and Moise Kean gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lille defender.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Moise Kean (PSG) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 60, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Lille make their first substitution with Jonathan David replacing Yusuf Yazici.
Tim Weah is replacing Jonathan Ikone for the home team.
In the minute 62, Lille pushes forward through Jonathan David, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 66, Francois Letexier awards Lille a goal kick.
PSG's Alessandro Florenzi breaks free at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lille.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for PSG in their own half.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 75, Burak Yilmaz for Lille drives towards goal at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 77, The away team replace Rafinha with Julian Draxler.
Kylian Mbappe is on a sub for Angel Di Maria for PSG.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In the minute 79, Christophe Galtier is making the team's third substitution at Stade Pierre Mauroy with Xeka replacing Benjamin Andre.
The match at Stade Pierre Mauroy has been interrupted briefly for a check on Presnel Kimpembe, who is down injured.
Mitchel Bakker (PSG) has replaced the possibly injured Presnel Kimpembe at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 83, Throw-in PSG.
Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Lille to check on Alessandro Florenzi, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 87, It seems as if Alessandro Florenzi is unable to continue. Ander Herrera replaces him for the away team.
Colin Dagba is replacing Layvin Kurzawa for PSG at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
In the minute 89, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Throw-in for Lille in the half of PSG.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lille.
Corner awarded to Lille.
Throw-in high up the field for Lille in Lille.
Corner awarded to Lille.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
